În cazul în care Parintii/Reprezentantul legal nu achita orice suma datorată in baza prezentului Contract la data scadenti, Verita are dreptul la penalitati de intarziere de 0,2% pe zi de intarziere din suma neachitata, calculate de la data scadentei pana la data efectiva a platii integrale. Parintii/ Reprezentantul legal e de drept in intarziere.

If the Parent/Legal Representative does not pay any amount due under this Contract, on the due date, Verita is entitled to late payment penalties of 0.2% per day of the outstanding amount, calculated from the due date until the actual date of full payment. The Parents/Legal Guardian is by law in default.
In cazul intarzierilor la plata, Verita va emite o notificare (reminder).

In cazul in care sumele raman neachitate, Parintelui/ Reprezentantului legal i se va trimite o a doua notificare pentru taxele restante; in acest moment, Verita poate decide ca accesul Elevului la serviciile / facilitatile scolii sa fie suspendat (in conformitate cu prevederile Sectiunii II - Termeni si Conditii General).
Transmiterea celor doua notificari nu constituie o obligatie contractuala in sarcina Verita si nici nu afecteaza dreptul Verita de a solicita penalitati de intarziere.

Rugam Parintii/Reprezentantul legal sa retina ca mijlocul de comunicare pentru transmiterea notificarilor de plata va fi adresa de e-mail furnizata de acestia, care ar trebui verificata in mod regulat.

Daca sumele datorate nu sunt achitat nici dupa cea de - a doua notificare, sau daca sumele raman neachitate pe o perioada ce depaseste 20 (douazeci) de zile de la scadenta - Verita, la exclusiva sa alegere, va putea rezilia prezentul Contract, fara ca vreo alta punere in intarziere si vreo alta formalitate prealabila sa fie necesara si fara interventia instantei de judecata, in conformitate cu prevederile articolului 1553, par. (1) din Codul Civil (pact comisoriu). Prezentele dispozitii se completeaza cu cele ce reglementeaza rezilierea din cuprinsul Sectiunii II - Termeni si conditii generale.
In case of late payment, Verita shall issue a reminder.

If the amounts remain unpaid, a second reminder will be sent to the Parent / Legal Representative for the outstanding fees; at this time, Verita may decide that the Student's access to school services / facilities will suspended (in accordance with the provisions of Section II - General Terms and Conditions).
The transmission of the two reminders is not a contractual obligation of Verita and does not affect Verita's right to request penalties for delay.
We are kindly asking the Parents/Legal Guardian to note that the payment reminders shall be sent to the e-mail address provided by the Parents/Legal Guardian which should be checked regularly.

If the outstanding amounts are still not settled after the second reminder, or if the amounts are not paid for more than 20 (twenty) days as of the due date - Verita, at its sole discretion, may terminate the Contract, without any further formal notice of delay or other prior formality being required and without court intervention in accordance with the provisions of article 1553, paragraph (1) in the Civil Code (lex comissoria). The hereby provisions shall be coroborated with those that regulate the termination within Section II - General Terms And Conditions.

div.div: IV. Obligatii de plata in cazul incetarii Contractului inainte de inchiderea Anului Scolar - Retragerea Elevului
IV. Payment obligations in case of Contract termination prior to the expiry of the School Year - Student Withdrawal

div.p: In caz de retragere a Elevului la initiativa Parintelui/Reprezentantului legal, acesta trebuie sa respecte dispozitiile privind denuntarea unilaterala din cuprinsul Sectiunii II - Termeni si Conditii General.

Obligatiile financiare stabilite in sarcina Parintilor/Reprezentantului Legal in caz de retragere:
Daca retragerea are loc pana la data de 30 iunie [de indicat anul] (inclusiv): se va retine Taxa de inscriere (Depozitului de reinscriere - dupa caz).
Daca retragerea are loc in intervalul 1 - 31 Iulie [de indicat anul] (inclusiv): se va retine Taxa de inscriere (Depozitului de reinscriere - dupa caz) plus 20% din Taxa anuala de scolarizare.
Daca retragerea are loc in intervalul 1 august [de indicat anul] - ultima zi a primului Semestru (inclusiv): se va datora 60% din Taxa anuala de scolarizare.
Daca retragerea are loc In orice moment dupa ultima zi a primului Semestru: se va datora 100% din Taxa anuala de scolarizare.

In case of Student withdrawal from school at the Parents/Legal Guardian initiative, the Parents/Legal Guardian must observe the provisions of unilateral termination - Section II - General Terms and Conditions.

Parents/Legal Representative financial obligations in case of withdrawal:
If the withdrawal takes place until June 30th [year to be inserted] (including): the Enrolment Fee (Re - enrolment Deposit as the case may be) shall be retained as damages.
If the withdrawal takes place between July 1st - July 31th [year to be inserted] (including): the Enrolment Fee (Re - enrolment Deposit as the case may be) shall be retained plus 20% of the Annual Tuition Fee.
If the withdrawal takes place starting with August 1st [year to be inserted] until the last day of the first Semester (including): 60% of the Annual Tuition Fee.
If the withdrawal takes place any point after the end of first Semester: 100% of the Annual Tuition Fee.

div.div: V. Obligatii de plata in cazul rezilierii la initiative Verita ca urmare a incalcarii obligatiilor contractuale de catre Parintilor/ Reprezentantului legal si/sau a Elevului
V. Payment obligations in case of Contract termination at Verita initiative due to breach of contract by the Parents/Legal Guardian and/or the Student

div.p: Verita incurajeaza toti parintii sa contacteze reprezentantii scolii si sa comunice provocarile cu care se confrunta lor inainte de a ajunge la punctul de a incalca obligatiile Contractuale.

Incalcarea obligatiilor contractuale da dreptul Verita sa considere contractul desfiintat de drept, fara interventia instantei de judecata, in conformitate cu prevederile articolului 11.4 - Termeni si Conditii Generale.

In cazul in care Verita reziliaza Contractul, Verita va avea dreptul sa solicite Parintilor/Reprezentantului Legal - in plus fata de plata taxelor stabilite in sarcina Parintilor/Reprezentantului Legal pana la data rezilierii conform prevederilor prezentului Contract - ca si compensatie (daune) pentru incetarea prematura a prezentului Contract, o suma fixa echivalenta cu 50% din Taxa Anuala de Scolarizare.
Incetarea contractului nu va avea niciun efect asupra obligatiilor deja scadente intre Parti.
Verita encourages all parents to approach the school representatives, and communicate their challenges before reaching the point of breaching the contractual obligations.

reach of contractual obligations entitles Verita to consider this Contract terminated by law, without court intervention in accordance with the provisions of article 11.4 - GeneralTerms and Conditions.

div.div: VII. Supravegherea video in incinta Scolii Verita
VII. Video surveillance within Verita premises

div.p: Verita, prin intermediul sistemelor de supraveghere video, colecteaza si prelucreaza inregistrari video in scopul asigurarii securitatii persoanelor si bunurilor, pazei si protectiei elevilor, bunurilor, valorilor si a materialelor utilizate in procesul educational precum si pentru prevenirea si combaterea infractionalitatii.
Sistemele de supraveghere video sunt instalate in spatiile comune.

Prin semnarea prezentului Contract, Beneficiarul Indirect declara ca a fost informat cu privire la Politica de supraveghere video si este de acord cu utilizarea acestui sistem conform scopului declarat de catre Verita.

Verita, via video surveillance systems, collects and processes video recordings for the purpose of ensuring the safety of persons and goods, the security and protection of students, goods, valuables and materials used in the educational process as well as for preventing and combatting crime.
The video surveillance systems are installed in the common spaces.

By signing this Contract, the Indirect Beneficiary declares that he/she was informed with respect to the video surveillance Policy and agrees to the use of this system for the purpose declared by Verita.

div.div: VIII. Obligatii esentiale privind starea de sanatate a Elevului
VIII. Essential obligations regarding the Student’s health condition

ol.li: Parintele/tutorele/reprezentantul legal al Elevului are obligatia esentiala de a prezenta documentele medicale solicitate la inscrierea Elevului sau pe parcursul Anului Scolar de catre Verita, in vederea mentinerii unui climat sanatos la nivel de clasa pentru evitarea degradarii starii de sanatate a celorlalti beneficiari directi din cadrul Scolii Verita.

The Student’s parent/guardian/legal representative has the essential obligation of presenting the medical documents requested by Verita upon the Student’s enrollment or throughout the School Year, for the purpose of maintaining a healthy climate in class in order to avoid the deterioration of the health condition of the other direct beneficiaries from Verita School.

div.div: X. Prelungirea valabilitatii Sectiunii II - Termeni si conditii general in cazul continuarii studiilor Elevului in cadrul Verita
X. Validity extension of Section II - General Terms and Conditions in case the Student continues his/her studies within Verita School

p.i: Decizia cu privire la continuarea studiilor in cadrul Scolii Verita a Beneficiarului Direct apartine exclusiv Parintilor/Reprezentantului legal si ea poate avea loc exclusiv cu conditia incheierii unui nou Contract educational aplicabil noului An Scolar.

div.strong: Contractul educational este format din doua Sectiuni:

ul.li: Sectiunea I – Termeni si Conditii Speciale
Sectiunea II – Termeni si Conditii Generale

p.b: Continuarea studiilor - dovedita prin incheierea unei noi Sectiuni I - Termeni si Conditii Speciale care sa corespunda noului An Scolar - va avea ca efect, prelungirea automata a valabilitatii Sectiunii II - Termeni si Conditii Generale (parte din Contractul de scolarizare incheiat pentru primul An Scolar al Elevului in cadrul Verita).

div.p: In considerarea celor de mai sus, Contractul de scolarizare aferent fiecarui nou An Scolar in cadrul Verita va fi format din: Sectiunea I - Termeni si Conditii Speciale (aferenta Anului Scolar respectiv) si Sectiunea II - Termeni si Conditii Generale (ersiunea semnata de parti in cadrul primului Contract Educational incheiat de parti).

p.b: Pentru evitarea oricarei neintelegeri, in cazul continuarii studiilor in cadrul Scolii Verita, partile vor negocia si semna Sectiunea I - Termeni si Conditii Speciale pentru fiecare An Scolar al Beneficiarului Direct in cadrul Scolii Verita, Sectiunea I urmand sa includa toate si orice modificari ale termenilor si conditiilor prevazute in cuprinsul Sectiunii II.

div.p: The decision regarding the Direct Beneficiary’s continuation of his/her studies within Verita School rests exclusively with the Parents/Legal Guardian and may occur exclusively pursuant to a new Educational Contract for the relevant School Year.
div.strong: The Educational Service Contract is formed of the two Sections:

ul.li: Section I – Special Terms and Conditions
Section II – General Terms and Conditions

p.b: The continuation of studies - proven by the conclusion of a new Section I - Special Terms and Conditions corresponding to the new School Year - will trigger the automatic extension of validity of Section II - General Terms and Conditions (part of the Educational Service Contract concluded in the first School Year of the Student).

div.p: In view of the above, the Educational Service Contract for each new School Year within Verita will consist of: Section I - Special Terms and Conditions (for the respective School Year) and Section II - General Terms and Conditions (version signed by the parties within the first Educational Service Contract concluded by the parties).

p.b: For the avoidance of any doubt, in the case of continuation of the studies within Verita School, the parties will negotiate and execute Section I – Special Terms and Conditions for each School Year of the Direct Beneficiary within Verita School, and Section I will include all and any modifications of the terms and conditions provided in Section II.

div.p: Contractul de scolarizare este format din prezenta Sectiune I - Termeni si Conditii Speciale si Sectiunea II - Termeni si Conditii Generale acestea formand un tot unitar.

In caz de conflict sau de prevederi contradictorii intre Sectiunea I si Sectiunea II vor prevala prevederile Sectiunii I.
The educational services contract is comprised of the present Section I - Special Terms and Conditions and Section II - General Terms and Conditions, which constitute a unitary whole.

Sa acorde primul ajutor de baza si/sau calificat in caz de urgenta medicala sau pericol iminent, inclusiv sa apeleze la serviciile medicale ale unitatilor spitalicesti.

All the data and information provided herein are complete, truthful and correct in every detail;

I hereby agree to the accessing and processing of personal data by Verita personnel and by third party medical personnel, for the purpose of fulfilling the legal obligations regarding medical assistance during school schedule and for providing emergency medical services (if necessary);

The electronic correspondence address indicated in the Contract – Section I is truthful, functional, verified by me and I hereby accept that all the requests, information and documents requested by Verita personnel with respect to or about Direct Beneficiary’s health condition transmitted to the e-mail address indicated above will be considered to be officially sent and received correspondence.

Failure to provide the aforementioned documentation may result in the suspension by Verita of the Student’s access to classes until the situation is remedied and/or – as the case may be, in the impossibility of the Student participating in activities for which the epidemiological certificate is mandatory.
If I will be announced by the Verita personnel that the child is sick/there is suspicion of sickness, I will immediately come to school in order to pick up the child.

I also declare that I authorize Verita personnel that, in case of medical emergency/imminent danger and/or if I cannot be contacted and/or I cannot travel to pick up the child from school:
To administer basic and/or qualified first aid measures in the case of a medical emergency or imminent danger, including by resorting to the medical services of hospital units.

tr.th: ACORD ACTIVITATI AER LIBER/CONSENT OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES

tr.td: Ca regula, programul educational in cadrul Verita include si activitati in aer liber, activitati care sunt mentionate in Orar si care sunt de scurta durata si nu genereaza costuri suplimentare.

td.p: As a rule, the educational program at Verita includes outdoor activities, which are specified in the Schedule, are limited in duration and do not entail additional expenses.

Ca regula, pentru deplasarile in afara unitatii scolare in vederea desfasurarii activitatilor in aer liber care sunt parte din Pachetul Educational (respectiv sunt incluse in orar si nu genereaza costuri suplimentare) prin semnarea prezentului Contract, Parintele/ Reprezentantul legal intelege ca isi da acordul in mod expres cu privire la parasirea temporara a incintei scolii. Parintele/Reprezentantul legal are dreptul, fara nicio restrictie, ca oricand pe durata Contractului, pentru o astfel de activitate sa opteze pentru neparticiparea copilului la activitatea respectiva, in acest sens informand in scris Verita.

As a rule, for field trips outside the school premises for the purposes of engaging in outdoor activities that are part of the Educational Package (are included in the schedule and do not entail additional costs), by signing this Contract, the Parent/Legal Guardian undertakes to expressly agree to the temporary departure from the school premises. The Parent/Legal Guardian has the unrestricted right, throughout the term of the Contract, to opt for his/her child not participating in the respective activity, by informing Verita in writing to this end.
